name: Moses: Prince of Egypt
description:
Back of Jewel Case - Playstation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

Found by the river, and adopted into the royal family of Egypt, Moses must start on a quest to save his true people, the Israelites, from misery at the hands of their cruel Pharaoh.

As well as a great half-hour cartoon video, Moses: Prince of Egypt features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game.

Can the Prince of Egypt fulfil his destiny?
